extendedInfo.description: This app shows the kata move by move by swiping a finger. It also lets you look at the kata from all four sides to see the moves from different directions.With your Android device, iPhone, iPod touch or iPad in your hand, you can review the moves of the kata in slow motion, then practice at full speed.There are buttons to repeat a move, go backwards and start over.Shotokan karate kata performed by JoaquÃ­n Santiago Urrea GonzÃ¡lez Â from Master Matsuyama's Doshikai karate school http://www.doshikai.net/ Frank Paolino had the original idea for this app. It was developed by Billy Westlin. Looking for another kata app? Â Or kata app for the iphone? See our other kata apps here: Â  Â  Â  http://www.doshikai.net/doshikai.nsf/page/Karate-Kata-Apps

reviews.comment: I noticed towards the end, after the first \"scoop\" and drawback, you added a different turn b4 going in for the second \"scoop\"?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin
reviews.comment: Very good app as I am currently learning the 3 kata on offer here but as many others have said would be good if there were more
reviews.author: Paul Lee

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s3 mini
reviews.comment: Brilliant!!! Downloaded all three. Can\'t wait for more of these apps.
reviews.author: Jordan Galbraith

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: It is really great, you learn you kata with great detail. Maybe you could do Nidan aswell? I would like to save onto my SD card, so if you could do that then its even better! :)
reviews.author: Heather KH

reviews.title: Great....!
reviews.comment: The only way to watch Katas step by step....! PLEASE PLEASE PLEAS ADD MORE KATAS. Would pay ( a little ) for others.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love these... Please do more! 5 stars!

reviews.title: Good effort.
reviews.comment: Some forms could be more precise. Double downward block is Gedan Beri (blocking opponent Mae Geri) and Gedan Oi Zuki to opponents shin.

reviews.title: Thank You
reviews.comment: I am already green belted in karate and i really need to learn this

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: Love this,i went back to karatie 2 years after quitting and this defnitely helped me get up to speed, just need more senior katas

reviews.title: Excellent Job
reviews.comment: Marvellous work, My kids Het and Nainesh-new to karate: also loved it. Thanks a lot..!!!

reviews.title: Enjoyable.
reviews.comment: Good to see traditional kata In a world full of mma, poetry in motion. Keep up the good work!
